mapper.sql: id as id, org_id as orgId, login_name as loginName, job_no as jobNo, user_name as userName, login_password as loginPassword, create_time as createTime, email as email, phone as phone, lifecycle as lifecycle
mapper.select: select u.id AS id,u.login_name as loginName,u.job_no as jobNo,u.user_name as userName,u.email as email,u.phone as phone,u.lifecycle as lifecycle, o.code as orgCode,o.name as orgName,o.full_name as orgFullName,t.code as orgTypeCode,t.name as orgTypeName from sys_user u join sys_organization o on u.org_id = o.id AND o.lifecycle=1 join sys_organization_type t on t.id = o.org_type_id where u.login_name = #{loginName} and u.login_password = #{loginPassword}
